message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but $120 is a bit low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $170 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $160?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

I've already mentioned that I'd be willing to sell it to John for $150, so I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think we're at a good point, so I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $160. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to sell it to John.
